statements.sql: insert into "customers" ("accepts_marketing", "addresses", "created_at", "default_address", "email", "phone", "first_name", "customer_id", "metafield", "multipass_identifier", "last_name", "last_order_id", "last_order_name", "network_id", "note", "orders_count", "state", "tags", "tax_exempt", "total_spent", "updated_at", "verified_email") values ('1', '[]', '2017-08-11 14:14:46', '', 'jodiluma@gmail.com', '', 'José Antonio duarte amaya', '6274934785', '', '', 'facebook', '', '', '1', '', '0', 'enabled', '', '0', '0.00', '2017-08-11 14:14:46', '1') returning "id"
select * from "terceros" where "terceros"."deleted_at" is null and "email" = 'jodiluma@gmail.com'
